title: Rehabilitation of the undermentioned sections of roads with domestic funds / foreign funds
decision_details: Programme funded by local banks and implemented through domestic contractors -  * Ambepussa - Kurunegala - Trincomalee Road (A6) - from Galewela to Dambulla (14 km) *  Wattala - Mahara Road (B460) (0 -7.24 km)  *  Warakapola - Anguruwella - Karawanella Road (B457) (0 -22 km) *  Kirinda - Palatupana - Yala Road (B499) (0-12.50 km) *  Passara - Monaragala Road (A22) (0-27.0 km) *  Thalduwa - Meewitigammana Road (B408) (0-17.30 km) *   Thalgodapitiya - Yatawatta - Dombawela Road (B409) (0-26.40 km) *  Polonnaruwa - Hingurakgoda Road (B552) (2.0-13.65 km) * Narammala - Dankotuwa Road (B308) (16.03 -45.25 km) Project funded by the Saudi Fund for Development - *  Road Section from Peliyagoda to Kiribathgoda along Colombo - Kandy Road (A1) - from 5.86 km to 13.10 km  Sections of 7 Roads which are either in the Eastern Province or provide accessibility to the Eastern Province, having a total length of 153.67 km - under the rapid development programme of “Negenahira Navodaya” *  A 17 - Galle - Deniyaya - Pelmadulla Roa (from Deniyaya to Madampe) - 51.90 km *  A 27 - Ampara - Uhana - Mahaoya Road - 27.83 km *  B 73 - Dadayanthalawa - Uhana Road *  B 77- Chawalakade - Dadayanthalawa Road - 24.79 km *  B 187 - Kalmune - Chawalakade Road *  B 502 - Manampitiya - Aralaganwila - Maduruoya Road - 30.00 km  *  B1 - Akkaraipattu - Varipathanchenai Road - 19.15 km Project funded by the OPEC Fund for International Development (OFID)- *  Road Section from Eheliyagoda to Dehiovita (B110)- 0.00 - 16.69 km *  Road Section from Ethulkotte to Kohuwala (B120) - 0.00 - 5.95 km Project funded by the Asian Development Bank (ADB) *  Road Section from Nugegoda to Homagama along Colombo - Ratnapura Road - from 1.0 km to 15.36 km
